sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Home.css'; const Home = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleQuickView = (bookId) => { navigate(`/quick-view/${bookId}`); }; const featuredBooks = [ { id: 1, title: "The Midnight Library", author: "Matt Haig", cover: "https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1602190253i/52578297.jpg", rating: 4.5, category: "Fiction" }, { id: 2, title: "Atomic Habits", author: "James Clear", cover: "https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1655988385i/40121378.jpg", rating: 4.8, category: "Self-Help" }, { id: 3, title: "Project Hail Mary", author: "Andy Weir", cover: "https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1597695864i/54493401.jpg", rating: 4.7, category: "Science Fiction" }, { id: 4, title: "Tomorrow, and Tomorrow, and Tomorrow", author: "Gabrielle Zevin", cover: "https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1636978687i/58784475.jpg", rating: 4.3, category: "Literary Fiction" } ]; const newArrivals = [ { id: 1, title: "Iron Flame", author: "Rebecca Yarros", cover: "https://storage.googleapis.com/du-prd/books/images/9781649374172.jpg", date: "2025-01-25", genre: "Fantasy" }, { id: 2, title: "The Heaven & Earth Grocery Store", author: "James McBride", cover: "https://storage.googleapis.com/du-prd/books/images/9780593422946.jpg", date: "2025-01-22", genre: "Historical Fiction" }, { id: 3, title: "House of Flame and Shadow", author: "Sarah J. Maas", cover: "https://storage.googleapis.com/du-prd/books/images/9781635574104.jpg", date: "2025-01-15", genre: "Fantasy" }, { id: 4, title: "Fourth Wing", author: "Rebecca Yarros", cover: "https://storage.googleapis.com/du-prd/books/images/9781649374042.jpg", date: "2025-01-10", genre: "Fantasy" }, { id: 5, title: "The Creative Act", author: "Rick Rubin", cover: "https://storage.googleapis.com/du-prd/books/images/9780593652886.jpg", date: "2025-01-05", genre: "Self-Help" }, { id: 6, title: "Tomorrow, and Tomorrow, and Tomorrow", author: "Gabrielle Zevin", cover: "https://storage.googleapis.com/du-prd/books/images/9780593321201.jpg", date: "2025-01-01", genre: "Literary Fiction" }, { id: 7, title: "Hello Beautiful", author: "Ann Napolitano", cover: "https://prodimage.images-bn.com/pimages/9780593243732_p0_v2_s1200x630.jpg", date: "2025-01-18", genre: "Contemporary Fiction" }, { id: 8, title: "Demon Copperhead", author: "Barbara Kingsolver", cover: "https://storage.googleapis.com/du-prd/books/images/9780063251922.jpg", date: "2025-01-12", genre: "Literary Fiction" }, { id: 9, title: "Yellowface", author: "R.F. Kuang", cover: "https://storage.googleapis.com/du-prd/books/images/9780063250833.jpg", date: "2025-01-08", genre: "Thriller" }, { id: 10, title: "Happy Place", author: "Emily Henry", cover: "https://storage.googleapis.com/du-prd/books/images/9780593441275.jpg", date: "2025-01-03", genre: "Romance" } ]; const bookOfDay = { title: "Lessons in Chemistry", author: "Bonnie Garmus", cover: "https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1634748496i/58065033.jpg", description: "A must-read debut novel! Set in 1960s California, it follows Elizabeth Zott, a chemist whose career takes an unexpected turn when she becomes the host of a TV cooking show. Witty, inspiring, and full of memorable characters, this book celebrates the power of perseverance and breaking societal norms.", rating: 4.6 }; const announcements = [ { id: 1, title: "Summer Reading Challenge", date: "2025-02-01", description: "Join our summer reading challenge and win exciting prizes! Read 10 books in 3 months to qualify.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1456513080510-7bf3a84b82f8?ixlib=rb-4.0.3" }, { id: 2, title: "Author Meet & Greet", date: "2025-02-15", description: "Meet bestselling author James Clear for a book signing and discussion session.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1475721027785-f74eccf877e2?ixlib=rb-4.0.3" }, { id: 3, title: "New Book Club", date: "2025-02-10", description: "Join our new Science Fiction book club! First meeting discusses 'Project Hail Mary'.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1532012197267-da84d127e765?ixlib=rb-4.0.3" } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Welcome to Your Library

Discover millions of books and connect with other readers

{/* Featured Books */}

Featured Books

{featuredBooks.map(book => (

{book.title}

by {book.author}

{'‚≠ê'.repeat(Math.floor(book.rating))} {book.rating}
{book.category}
))}
{/* Book of the Day */}

Book of the Day

‚≠ê {bookOfDay.rating}

{bookOfDay.title}

by {bookOfDay.author}

{bookOfDay.description}

{/* New Arrivals Section */}

New Arrivals

Discover our latest additions to the library collection

{newArrivals.map(book => (
{ e.target.onerror = null; e.target.src = 'https://placehold.co/400x600/1e40af/ffffff?text=' + encodeURIComponent(book.title); }} />
New {book.genre}

{book.title}

by {book.author}

Added {new Date(book.date).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'short', day: 'numeric', year: 'numeric' })}

))}
{/* Announcements & Events */}

Library Updates

{announcements.map(announcement => (

{announcement.title}

{announcement.date}

{announcement.description}

))}
{/* Library Information */}

Visit Us

üìç Main Branch

123 Library Street

Open: Mon-Sat, 9 AM - 8 PM

üìû Contact Us

Phone: (555) 123-4567

Email: library@example.com

); }; export default Home;
